meanings.definition: A division or part of a larger section
meanings.sent1: The book is divided into several subsections for easier reading.
meanings.sent2: In the library, the science books are located in the subsections dedicated to different subjects.
meanings.sent3: The subsections of the cake were so tiny that it looked like a puzzle waiting to be solved.
meanings.sent4: Each subsection of the garden bloomed with colors as vibrant as a rainbow.
meanings.sent5: Navigating through the subsections of the map felt like exploring a miniature world.

meanings.definition: A smaller part of a larger group or category
meanings.sent1: The subsections of the team worked on different aspects of the project.
meanings.sent2: In the store, the clothing section has subsections for men, women, and children.
meanings.sent3: The subsections of the puzzle were so tiny that it was challenging to fit the pieces together.
meanings.sent4: Each subsection of the orchestra played a unique role in creating harmonious music.
meanings.sent5: The subsections of the forest teemed with diverse wildlife, each playing its part in the ecosystem.
